inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getReplicationGroup.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getReplicationGroup.

arn.description: ARN of the created ElastiCache Replication Group.

automaticFailoverEnabled.description: A flag whether a read-only replica will be automatically promoted to read/write primary if the existing primary fails.

configurationEndpointAddress.description: The configuration endpoint address to allow host discovery.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

memberClusters.description: Identifiers of all the nodes that are part of this replication group.

multiAzEnabled.description: Whether Multi-AZ Support is enabled for the replication group.

numCacheClusters.description: The number of cache clusters that the replication group has.

numNodeGroups.description: Number of node groups (shards) for the replication group.

port.description: The port number on which the configuration endpoint will accept connections.

primaryEndpointAddress.description: The endpoint of the primary node in this node group (shard).

readerEndpointAddress.description: The endpoint of the reader node in this node group (shard).

replicasPerNodeGroup.description: Number of replica nodes in each node group.

snapshotRetentionLimit.description: The number of days for which ElastiCache retains automatic cache cluster snapshots before deleting them.

snapshotWindow.description: Daily time range (in UTC) during which ElastiCache begins taking a daily snapshot of your node group (shard).
